Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is light-brown in section, the interior is encrusted with a light-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394253) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394253)
